summary.span: 根据一组 对 属性的值进行动画处理。

span.span: Animates the value of a property along a set of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关键帧动画的目标值由其 属性定义，该属性包含 对象的集合。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每个 都定义了一段动画，其中包含其自身的目标 和 。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 动画运行时，它会在指定的键时间从一个键值前进到下一个键值。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.

span.span: KeyFrame Animation Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不接受文本作为子级，因此此方法将引发 `InvalididOperationException`，除非派生类已重写允许添加文本的行为。A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `defaultOriginValue` 是组合链中的第一个，则此值将为快照值（如果有）或基属性值;否则，此值将是链中前一个动画返回的值，其中的 不 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . 如果动画位于属性上动画的第一个组合层中，则 `defaultDestinationValue` 为基值;否则，该值为属性的上一个动画组合层的输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
